verification.title: Verify Your Email Address
verification.message: Thank you for signing up! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.alternativeText: Or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
verification.expiryMessage: This verification link will expire in {{hours}} hours.
verification.footer: If you did not create an account, no further action is required.

passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.message: You recently requested to reset your password. Click the button below to proceed.
passwordReset.alternativeText: Or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
passwordReset.expiryMessage: This password reset link will expire in {{hours}} hours.
passwordReset.securityNote: If you did not request a password reset, please secure your account by changing your password.
passwordReset.footer: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

welcome.title: Welcome to Our Store
welcome.message: Thank you for creating an account with us. We're excited to have you join our community of tire enthusiasts!
welcome.benefit2: Save your favorite tires for future reference
welcome.closingMessage: If you have any questions about your account or need help finding the perfect tires, our team is here to help.
welcome.signature:
Best regards,
The Tire Store Team

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmation
orderConfirmation.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your order! We've received your purchase and are working on it now.
orderConfirmation.questionsMessage: If you have any questions about your order, please contact our customer service team.
orderConfirmation.footer: Thank you for shopping with us!

confirmation.title: Appointment Confirmation
confirmation.message: Your appointment has been confirmed. We're looking forward to seeing you!
confirmation.arrivalMessage: Please arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled time to complete any necessary paperwork.
confirmation.rescheduleMessage: If you need to reschedule or cancel your appointment, please do so at least 24 hours in advance by clicking the button above or contacting us directly.

reminder.title: Reminder: Your Upcoming Appointment
reminder.message: This is a friendly reminder about your upcoming appointment with us.
reminder.arrivalMessage: Please arrive 10 minutes before your scheduled time to complete any necessary paperwork.
reminder.rescheduleMessage: If you need to reschedule or cancel, please do so as soon as possible by clicking the button above or contacting us directly.

forgotPassword.success: Password reset link sent to your email
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below

premium.title: Premium Installation
premium.includes: Standard + Tire Protection Package & Lifetime Rotations

specialty.title: Specialty Installation
specialty.includes: For Run-Flat, Low-Profile, and Custom Wheels

pricing.note: Prices may vary based on vehicle type and tire specifications

time.question: How long does installation take?
time.answer: Standard installation typically takes 45-60 minutes for a full set of four tires.

appointment.question: Do I need an appointment?
appointment.answer: While we accept walk-ins, we recommend scheduling an appointment to minimize wait time.

bring.question: What should I bring for installation?
bring.answer: Just your vehicle and keys. If you purchased tires elsewhere and want us to install them, bring those along too.

wait.question: Can I wait while my tires are installed?
wait.answer: Yes, our comfortable waiting area has free Wi-Fi, refreshments, and TV.

warranty.question: Is the installation service warranted?
warranty.answer: Yes, all tire installations come with our service warranty to ensure your satisfaction.

cta.subtitle: Get your tires installed by certified professionals
